name: day-05-practice
description: A short demo of how to handle postgres with express

scripts.db:reset: psql -U postgres -d projects < ./src/db/migrations/init.sql && psql -U postgres -d projects < ./src/db/seeds/users.seeds.sql && psql -U postgres -d projects < ./src/db/seeds/urls.seeds.sql

author: Daniel Gonzalez Briseno
